text: Kiya tu ney ussay nahi dekha jo saltanat paa ker ibrahim (alh-e-salam) say uss kay rab kay baray mein jhagar raha tha jab ibrahim (alh-e-salam) ney kaha mera rab to woh hai jo jilata aur maarta hai woh kehney laga mein bhi jilata aur maarta hun ibrahim (alh-e-salam) ney kaha Allah Taalaa sooraj ko mashriq ki taraf say ley aata hai tu issay maghrib ki janib say ley aa. Abb to woh kafir bhoncka reh gaya aur Allah Taalaa zalimon ko hidayat nahi deta
